channel.title: Comments on: Hip and quirky: Istanbul’s Noble House Galata guesthouse

item.title: By: Sarah Duff » Falling in love with Istanbul
item.dc:creator: Sarah Duff » Falling in love with Istanbul
item.description: [...] tapenades, cheese, parcels filled with nuts and cheese, glace walnuts, cherries, eggs and bread. Read more about Noble House Galata here. Doubles from €65. [...]
